poem:
Title: "Echoes of War"

In the fragility of peace, echoes awaken,
dreams of quiet days beaten by sands of discord.
Netanyahu's words dance with warlike throb,
A piano string snapped, ceaselessly unbroken.
Biden's proposal, an orphan in the turmoil,
A six-week lullaby waiting to be heard,
Yet, amid the clamor, the gazelle of hope persists,
Guiding us to tentatively whisper, it could be.
